dcterms:description: The dataset consists of a training, development, and test set, where each row represents a 3-turn conversation between two people. The task is to classify the emotion of the conversation as 'Happy', 'Sad', 'Angry', or 'Others'.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 3 Dataset

dcterms:description: Wikitext-103 is a dataset consisting of 28,595 preprocessed Wikipedia articles and 103 million words, used for training language models.

dcterms:description: BooksCorpus is a dataset containing 800 million words from books, used for training deep bidirectional language models.

dcterms:description: The NTUA-SLP Dataset is used for predicting affective content in tweets, employing deep attentive RNNs and transfer learning.

dcterms:description: The DeepMoji Dataset consists of 1246 million tweets containing one of 64 common emojis, used for detecting sentiment, emotion, and sarcasm.
